hero.title: We Build, Execute & Scale
hero.description: Reality Venture is an execution-first accelerator and venture builder focused on creating scalable, investment-ready companies. We work hands-on with founders and partners to turn real problems into real businesses.

visionMission.visionText: To be the leading execution-first accelerator in the region, transforming innovative ideas into sustainable businesses.
visionMission.missionText: We work hand-in-hand with founders, providing the resources, expertise, and network needed to build scalable companies.
visionMission.whyWeExistTitle: Bridging the gap between strategy and reality.
visionMission.whyWeExistDescription: We don't just advise; we execute. Reality Venture was built to solve the execution gap that kills most early-stage ventures. We combine capital with hands-on operational support to ensure success.

strategicGoals.title: We don't move forward until the execution boxes are ticked.
strategicGoals.description: Our strategic focus allows founders to build with confidence and speed.

goals.title: Reduce Risk
goals.description: Reduce early-stage execution and operational risk

goals.title: Ship Products
goals.description: Transform ideas into shipped, market-tested products

goals.title: Get Investment
goals.description: Convert validated traction into institutional-grade investment opportunities

targetAudience.title: Who We Work With
targetAudience.description: Connecting the key pillars of the venture ecosystem in one unified platform.

founders.label: 01 For Founders
founders.title: Founders
founders.headline: Founders stage
founders.description: Pre-seed and seed-stage teams building scalable, technology-enabled businesses globally.

operators.label: 02 For Operators
operators.title: Operators & Experts
operators.headline: Advise & Operate
operators.description: Experienced professionals seeking to advise, operate, or co-build ventures.

investors.label: 03 For Investors
investors.title: Investors & Partners
investors.headline: Strategic Partners
investors.description: Funds, corporates, and institutions looking for high-quality, execution-ready ventures.

services.title: Our Expertise
services.subtitle: Comprehensive Services
services.description: Everything you need to go from idea to scale

businessModeling.title: Business Modeling
businessModeling.description: We help you create robust business models that validate your market fit and revenue streams.

management.title: Management & Operations
management.description: Our team supports you in setting up efficient operational processes and management structures.

fundraising.title: Fundraising Readiness
fundraising.description: We prepare you for investment by refining your pitch, financials, and growth strategy.

mentorship.title: Strategic Mentorship
mentorship.description: Access to industry experts who provide guidance on scaling, strategy, and execution.

network.title: Network Access
network.description: Connect with our network of partners, investors, and fellow entrepreneurs.

technology.title: Technology & Innovation
technology.description: Leverage cutting-edge technology to build scalable and innovative solutions.

programs.title: Programs
programs.subtitle: Choose the right path for your journey
programs.description: Whether you're starting from scratch or ready to scale, we have a program tailored to your needs.

accelerator.title: Accelerator Program
accelerator.description: For early-stage startups with a validated concept ready to scale.

ventureBuilder.title: Venture Builder
ventureBuilder.description: For entrepreneurs with innovative ideas who need hands-on support to build.

corporate.title: Corporate Innovation
corporate.description: For established companies seeking to innovate through new ventures.

process.title: How It Works
process.description: A simplified, execution-focused engagement model designed for velocity.

steps.title: Apply
steps.description: Submit a focused application highlighting the problem, solution, and execution capability.

steps.title: Selection
steps.description: Fast evaluation and alignment on scope, objectives, and expectations.

steps.title: Build & Execute
steps.description: Rapid product development, market testing, and weekly execution support.

steps.title: Scale or Raise
steps.description: Support for operational scaling or capital raising based on company readiness.

ventures.title: PropTech Reality Venture
ventures.subtitle: Real Estate & Hospitality Venture Building
ventures.description: PropTech Reality Venture Accelerator is the venture-building arm of Reality Venture, focused on co-creating companies in real estate and hospitality technology.
ventures.approach: We act as a long-term venture partner—not a traditional accelerator—working hands-on from ideation through launch, scaling, and capital formation.

focusAreas.text: Booking, pricing, and revenue management systems
Guest experience, service automation, and digital concierge solutions
Smart buildings, facilities management, and energy optimization
Franchising systems and scalable hospitality operating models

ventures.supportingTechDesc: To enable strong PropTech ventures, we actively build and support companies in adjacent technology verticals.

verticals.title: FinTech
verticals.desc: Payments, embedded finance, lending, and cash-flow infrastructure

verticals.title: AI & Data
verticals.desc: Predictive analytics, demand forecasting, pricing intelligence

verticals.title: Marketplaces
verticals.desc: Platforms connecting owners, operators, service providers

verticals.title: IoT
verticals.desc: Smart devices and systems for buildings and asset monitoring

team.title: Meet the Team
team.description: We are a collective of founders, operators, and product experts. No career consultants—only builders who have done it before.

advisors.title: Advisors & Operators
advisors.description: A network of senior product, technology, growth, and operations leaders.

ceo.name: Yousif Al Harbi
ceo.title: Founder & CEO
ceo.bio: Responsible for strategy, venture outcomes, and long-term value creation.

headOfAcceleration.name: Saad Altwaim
headOfAcceleration.title: Co-Founder & Business Partner
headOfAcceleration.bio: Leads accelerator programs and execution quality.

headOfVentureBuilding.name: Hamad Alsuliman
headOfVentureBuilding.title: Co-Founder & Business Partner
headOfVentureBuilding.bio: Oversees venture creation from inception to scale.

investmentManager.name: Badryah Hanbashi
investmentManager.title: Investment Manager
investmentManager.bio: Leads investment strategy, diligence, and portfolio capital plans.

investorRelationsManager.name: Agad Alnemri
investorRelationsManager.title: Investors Relation Manager
investorRelationsManager.bio: Builds trusted LP relationships and orchestrates transparent reporting.

operationsManager.name: Fahad Alharbi
operationsManager.title: Operation Manager
operationsManager.bio: Runs day-to-day venture operations with precision and accountability.

marketingManager.name: Dalal Alnasser
marketingManager.title: Marketing Manager
marketingManager.bio: Shapes go-to-market stories and demand programs across ventures.

cto.name: Ahmed Afifi
cto.title: CTO
cto.bio: Leads engineering standards, platform strategy, and technical governance.
